## Self review

- [ ] There is no commented code.
- [ ] There is no TODO/FIXME comments without associated issue ticket.
- [ ] Commits are properly organized
- [ ] Verification
  - [ ] Unit tests were updated to include the change.
  - [ ] Change has been tested.
